name: Traveller (Grace Chua)
description:
STORY

You wake up on a spacecraft floating perilously through space and soon realize that you are the only human left on the spacecraft. As your spacecraft falls apart, will you manage to steer yourself home in time?

Developed by WDK

Darren Lin – Producer, Serialization, Sound
Joey Foo – Tech Lead, Dialogue
Simon Chew – Physics, Collision
Chuan Guang Hao – ECS, UI, Event System
Grace Chua – Editor, Gameplay
Luo Yu Xuan – Graphics, Materials, PBR Shaders, Resource Manager, Particle System
Graeme Ong – Graphics, Lighting, Shadow, UI

Sheryl Boh – Art Lead, Designer
Jordan Choo – Design Lead
Toh Boon Wee – Co-art Lead, Designer
